text: Mark off the width and height of Kagami. Draw the shape of her head. Add a line through the center of the figure.
Draw Kagami’s neck, body and hair.
Draw guidelines for the girl’s arms, hands, feet and facial features.
Add shapes for the arms, hands, legs and feet. Sketch the blouse collar.
Draw Kagami’s fingers, clothes, irises and hair.
Work on the figures, paying special attention to detail.
Contour Kagami, trying to vary the thickness and darkness of the line. Add the ground. Erase all guidelines.
